definitions.text: (physiology) a shortening or tensing of a part or organ (especially of a muscle or muscle fiber)
the process or result of becoming smaller or pressed together
examples: the contraction of a gas on cooling

definitions.text: a word formed from two or more words by omitting or combining some sounds
examples: `o'clock' is a contraction of `of the clock'

definitions.text: the act of decreasing (something) in size or volume or quantity or scope
